trans-unit.source: Create app passwords in the Azure portal for Azure Multi-Factor Authentication
trans-unit.target: Create app passwords in the Azure portal for Azure Multi-Factor Authentication

trans-unit.source: This page shows users how they can create additional app passwords in the Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: This page shows users how they can create additional app passwords in the Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: Create app passwords in the Azure portal for Azure Multi-Factor Authentication
trans-unit.target: Create app passwords in the Azure portal for Azure Multi-Factor Authentication

trans-unit.source: If you use multi-factor authentication with Azure you will want to create app passwords through the Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: If you use multi-factor authentication with Azure you will want to create app passwords through the Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: To create app passwords in the Azure portal
trans-unit.target: To create app passwords in the Azure portal

trans-unit.source: Sign-in to the Azure Management portal
trans-unit.target: Sign-in to the Azure Management portal

trans-unit.source: At the top, right-click on your user name and select Additional Security Verification.
trans-unit.target: At the top, right-click on your user name and select Additional Security Verification.

trans-unit.source: On the proofup page, at the top, select app passwords
trans-unit.target: On the proofup page, at the top, select app passwords

trans-unit.source: Enter a name for the app password and click Next
trans-unit.target: Enter a name for the app password and click Next

trans-unit.source: Copy the app password to the clipboard and paste it into your app.
trans-unit.target: Copy the app password to the clipboard and paste it into your app.
